mapper.select: select date_time,image_use_count,user_id from date_value where date_time between #{startTime} and #{nowTime} and user_id = #{userId}
select desk_count from date_value where date_time between #{yesterday} and #{dateTime} and user_id = #{userId}
select date_time,user_id,desk_count sumNum,desk_use useNum from date_value where date_time between #{useTime} and #{nowTime}
